column4: hey guys, i bought a new wireless adapter... and the drivers are in .exe format, which i cannot use in linux even with ndiswrapper... or can i??
if you can get the .ini or w/e files extracted you can
but you might not even need ndiswrapper
how would i know? i mean i cant get online when i sign on linux cuz i dont ahve it wired, so i need to figure out what to put on external hd haha
